metadata.title: Home
metadata.description: SXYA Community is a group of people who are passionate about life and love to share their experiences with others.

hero.title: SXYA Community Worldwide
hero.description: If you are looking for conversation ideas, we could talk about hobbies, travel, current events, personal goals, pop culture, food, or career. Is there anything in particular that interests you?

member.title: Meet our founders
member.description: Libero fames augue nisl porttitor nisi, quis. Id ac elit odio vitae elementum enim vitae ullamcorper suspendisse.

procedure.title: Event Planning Procedure
procedure.description: We have built various standardized processes to build events that are more reliable and suited for the majority of people in order to make events function more smoothly and efficiently.

initiation.title: Preliminary Planning
initiation.description: Develop initial event details, including location, number of participants, date, and time.

consensus.title: Feedback-based Adjustments
consensus.description: Ask all members if they choose to participate and make adjustments to satisfy the majority.

validation.title: Follow-up and Confirmation
validation.description: Follow-up with non-responsive members to ask if they choose to participate and adjust to satisfy the majority.

implementation.title: Event Execution
implementation.description: Carry out the details that have been agreed upon, such as reservations and confirmation.

feedback.title: Post-execution Inquiry
feedback.description: Follow-up with non-responsive members to ask if they choose to participate (without adjusting event details).

notification.title: Detail Notification
notification.description: Notify all members of the event details and any changes that have been made.

dictionary.title: Dictionary
dictionary.description: The following phrases are randomly selected from SXYA dictionary.

hero.title: Our Members
hero.description: We are a community of people who are passionate about life and the world around us. We are a diverse group of people from all walks of life, and we are united to gaming and various events.

core_members.title: Core Members
core_members.description: The members whom soul and heart connected to the community.

official_members.title: Official Members
official_members.description: The members whom actively participate in the community.

verified_members.title: Verified Members
verified_members.description: The members whom are known to the community.

dining.title: Dining
dining.description: Social meal event, casual or formal.

giveaway.title: Giveaway
giveaway.description: Exchanging presents to show appreciation or celebrate.
